snippet: The Maple Leafs took just 12 shots, but still shut out the Devils, who lost for the 10th straight time.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Toronto Maple Leafs defeat New Jersey Devils, 2-0; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Maple Leafs took just 12 shots, but still shut out the Devils, who lost for the 10th straight time.

headline.seo: Listless Devils Fall to 10th Straight Loss
headline.main: Maple Leafs Defeat Devils and Need Only 12 Shots to Do It
headline.print_headline: Maple Leafs Defeat Devils and Need Only 12 Shots to Do It
